name: Shadow Wizard (jam_mack46)
description:
Made for TriJam #180. Theme is 'My weakness is also my strength'

I took a players health is there weakness. So if you press space bar it costs you health but creates 2 shadow warriors to battle with. The shadow warriors can shoot and take no damage. Game gets faster every 10 seconds.

'WASD" to move and mouse to aim and shoot.

'Space' to create shadow warriors. 'Space' removes the warriors but no need to do that in this early release.

Ran out of time so just a high score game. Lots of potential for further development be interested to hear what people think of concept. Thanks.
